statements: DELETE FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_id = 101 AND asset_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_location = 'Warehouse A' OR asset_quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM Asset WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND purchase_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE employee_id = 3 AND return_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM asset_assignment WHERE assignment_id = 500 AND return_date IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' AND employee_department = 'IT';
